short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add your preferred language to the filter list and filter out tweets that are not in your preferred language.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: I was seeing posts in my native language even though I only wanted to see English content. I thought this extension might help you as well! You can select any language as your preferred language and posts in other languages will be removed.
